metadata.title: CVE-2018-6179 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient enforcement of file access permission in the activeTab case inExtensions in Google Chrome prior to 68.0.3440.75 allowed an attacker whoconvinced a user to install a malicious extension to access files on thelocal file system via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
